main event: An individual witnessed a flaming, fiery disc-like object in New Mexico in November 1958.
interesting points: The object was described as trailing off into space at a speed faster than a jet., The sighting occurred approximately a week or two before Thanksgiving., Observations were made from a Greyhound bus., A report was sent to ATIC in 1962 but investigation was not possible due to lack of data., The witness expressed disbelief that others would believe their account.
witness description: The witness described the object as moving extremely fast and unlike any aircraft they had seen before.
